HD: Legacy Hotels REIT Agrees to Acquisition
CY: Copyright 2007 Dow Jones & Company, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
LP:
TORONTO -- Legacy Hotels Real Estate Investment Trust agreed to be acquired by Cadbridge Investors LP and InnVest Real Estate Investment Trust for 12.6 Canadian dollars ($12.05) a unit.
Legacy valued the proposed acquisition at about C$2.5 billion, including debt.
TD:
Fairmont Hotels &Resorts Inc., Legacy's largest unitholder, representing 20.4% of the outstanding voting rights, entered a lockup agreement to tender its entire ownership interest, Legacy said.
After the acquisition, Legacy's portfolio of assets will be allocated with Cadbridge owning the large Fairmont-managed hotels and InnVest owning primarily Delta hotels. Cadbridge is a limited partnership formed by Cadim, a division of fund manager Caisse de depot et placement du Quebec and Westmont Hospitality Group. InnVest and Legacy are hotel REITs.
